post:
DesiVPS is based in Mumbai with servers hosted in Los Angeles. We don’t lease servers, we buy our own server hardware and co-locate them on various networks. To stand out in the IT industry compared to the many competitors, we rely above all on excellent customer service. From our headquarters in Mumbai, our experts will assist you with all matters relating to servers.
